title: Kaia Gerber puts on a racy display as she poses topless in dressing room mirror selfies
text:
Kaia Gerber posed topless while she was getting ready for Andrew Watt's birthday bash on Sunday.

The 18-year-old showed off some of her best model poses, while teasing a hint of her figure in the Instagram mirror selfie.

Kaia worked the camera as she sat in her dressing room chair and protected her modesty with her arms.

Stripping off: Kaia Gerber posed topless while she was getting ready in a racy Instagram post, uploaded on Sunday

She wore a trio of gold necklaces and accentuated her natural beauty with a pink palette of make-up.

After posing for the camera, Kaia changed into black leather jacket, high waist jeans, and edgy ankle boots to party with the likes of Justin and Hailey Bieber.

Also in attendance Andrew hosted, Camila Cabello, Jared Leto, Kaia Gerber, Scooter Braun, and Lori Loughlin's daughter Olivia Jade and her boyfriend Jackson Guthy.

Moody: The 18-year-old showed off some of her best model poses while teasing a hint of her figure in the mirror selfie

Party-time: After posing for the camera, Kaia changed into black leather jacket, high waist jeans, and edgy ankle boots to party with the likes of Justin and Hailey Bieber

A rising star in the world of modelling, Kaia has been following in the footsteps of her mother Cindy Crawford.

However, the young model never believed they looked anything alike until only recently.

'From day one, people in the industry were often taken aback by my resemblance to my mum,' she wrote in an essay for Vogue.

'As I get older, it happens even more, and it's not just a visual thing: It's everything from our mannerisms to our voices, it used to be that I didn't see it at all, but now I will look at a picture and have to take a moment before realizing which one of us it is.'

Following in her footsteps: Kaia's mum Cindy Crawford meanwhile showed off her supermodel looks as she enjoyed a morning cup of coffee in Malibu

But she went on to reveal that the 'biggest compliment' of all is when someone says she 'acts like her mum.'

'Beyond her beauty and obvious appeal, she has always been my hero and my role model because of the way she treats people and the lens that she sees the world through, and that's something for which I'm beyond grateful.'

And Kaia may be one of the world's most sought after supermodels but also admitted in her essay that dating isn't a priority for her.
